eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing

Class MessagePassingAlgorithm<E extends Vector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.inference.messagepassing.MessagePassingAlgorithm<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VMP

    public abstract class MessagePassingAlgorithm<E extends Vector>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    This class implements the interface InferenceAlgorithm and defines the Message Passing algorithm.
